pullrequest.title: homebrew updates: remove old tap, no auto-update

content.raw: Changes looks good to me. The auto-update mechanism is something I rarely see in package managers. It brings benefits but the cost in stability for the already difficult to stabilize rolling-release tool is high.
content.html: Changes looks good to me. The auto-update mechanism is something I rarely see in package managers. It brings benefits but the cost in stability for the already difficult to stabilize rolling-release tool is high.
